transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. Children ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 I carry many kids.
🛑 I stop to pick you up.
💛 I am often yellow.

transport.question: I float on the water and help you travel to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a canoe.
🚢 I can carry lots of people and cars.
⚓ I have an anchor.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you pedal with your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You need to balance on me.
🔔 I have a bell you can ring.
🚲 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to different cities. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
💺 You need a seatbelt when you ride me.
✈️ I have wings.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people from one town to another. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
💺 You can sit and look out the window.
🛤️ I follow a special path on the ground.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights and help people who are hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am very loud.
🚑 I take people to the hospital.
❤️ I help to keep you safe.

transport.question: I am a car, but I take people wherever they want to go for money. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 You can find me at a taxi rank.
🚖 I often have a sign on top.
💰 You pay the driver when you reach your destination.

transport.question: I fly, but I'm not an airplane. I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 Sometimes police or news crews use me.
➕ I can land in small places.

transport.question: I go really fast and can take people to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
✨ I explore the stars.

transport.question: I travel on the sea, but I can also go underwater. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can dive deep.
🐠 I can explore the ocean floor.
🚢 Some are used for research and some are used for war.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I'm the color of many plants!
🐄 Animals like to munch on me.
🌱 I help make a yummy field for you to play in!

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and sometimes beautiful colors! What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I make a lovely gift!
💧 I need water to grow.
🌞 I like to face the sun.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I'm often yellow and curved.
🐒 Monkeys peel me before eating me.
🌳 I hang from a tree branch.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk and many branches. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall.
🪵 People can build houses out of me.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I'm often given as a symbol of love.
🥀 Be careful of my thorns!
💐 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I grow underground and am orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a root vegetable.
🐇 I help bunnies see better.
👩‍🌾 I grow in a garden.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant that grows kernels which people can eat, and you can pop me to make a snack!

hints.text: 🚜 I am grown on a farm.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🌽 I am yellow.

plant.question: I'm a seed that you grind into flour, and people use me to bake yummy bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in big fields that look like waves in the wind.
🍞 I am a grain.
👩‍🍳 I am used to make cakes and cookies too.

plant.question: I am a juicy red fruit with many seeds. You cut me into slices and I am refreshing on a hot day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am green on the outside and red on the inside.
🏖 I'm a popular treat in the summer.
🌱 I grow on vines.

plant.question: I'm a large, round vegetable that grows close to the ground and is often orange. People carve faces into me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I'm a symbol of autumn.
🥧 I can be made into a pie.
👻 I’m used for decorations in October.
